favourite.article: I absolutely love this song and I totally agree with all the lyrics. Oh, Lord, I want to be a Young person absolute for Your move!
Great song. we sang this song when we were blending with the brothers and sisters from east side of Indonesia in Prigen 2015. it was just so great. we are full of Christ. Amen.
Lord we desire to be the Nazarites of today...no matter what.
#GoEast

The Lord needs some Samuels in this age! I was touched to take the Nazarite vow to consecrate my being to the Lord. From this day forward, I will not partake of the product of grapes or cut my hair. Dear saints, I ask that you hold me to this word! Ecclesiastes 5:5 says "It is better that you should not vow than that you should vow and not pay."

LORD THANK YOU that You are so faithful to us. We praise You that You rescue us in this godless age... Cause us to love You best that we could aside ourselves to gain Your heart's desire... in ourselves we can't , but we have You! We love You! And we allow You to work in us.. You would be our light to become the testimony in this godless age...

I love this song! I also never knew there were four verses- only used to the first 2. I was touched this time that The Lord will not return until we take Him as our King. Each day we need to enthrone Him in our thoughts, actions, and in our being. We need to lay the tracks and fear offending Him, really fear doing anything to lose His presence. Oh Lord we are not absolute. Make us Your absolute ones!
Oh Lord Jesus, make us those who meet your need! Young people absolute for Your move, ready to bring you back. Come Lord Jesus!!!
I never knew there were 4 verses, I've only ever sung the first 2! Praise the Lord for raising up young overcomers who are deeply rooted in the Word and in prayer!
Lord, I voluntarily consecrate my whole being to You...

Good morning friends today as I woke up I realize that God is so good to me, even when things are going rough with me guess what He is right there. The time came as I lost my mother & the way she died I never admit how she died, but one day as I were siting in this restaurant and this young man looks at me and some how all these tears just comes flowing, then I say God why, why did You take her so soon because she was so far from me & now what am I going to do without her. His response Deslyn she is right here in your heart & am right here with you so don't let go, I said I know but I love her so much and what am going to do now, again He said Deslyn your mother is a beautiful lady & you are beautiful also and guess what she is going to make it in the Kingdom and so are you so don't cry am right by your side as always, I cry again & say ok Jesus I know & I love you Mom.

Young people, how we need to rise up to be the Nazarites of this age. May we be those voluntary consecrated ones like Samuel ,David, Isaiah and the Lord Jesus when they were living on this earth. Every age, God is calling for those overcomers who will turn the age . May we be those who take heed to His call.
This song had given me some fragments about my future. Thanks and God bless.

Make us those who meet Your need, the Nazarites. Make us those through whom You'd close this age; Who are one with You to bring the kingdom in, Young people absolute for Your move.
May this just be our prayer.
PTL! we are such a chosen generation to speak and build the Body of God. we should be the speaking ones, eager and brave to speak the Word of God!
Amen, Lord we want to treasure Your word, and to be joined together to bring You back!
I love this song!! May the Lord really gain what He is after!

I love this song. May the Lord raise us up to meet the Lord's need: some Nazarites, prophets, priests, and judges, and men of prayer, speaking forth the Word of God with His authority; a photo of God's heart for His move. May the Lord gain me and all the young people to be God's overcomers. Lord, I consecrate and sacrifice all my life for You, Lord. Train me, Lord.
Lord, I consecrate myself to You! I want to be one of the many Nazarites who will turn this age, having a dispensational value for Your move today. Lord, raise up more Nazarite to meet Your need.
Lord we want to be the Nazarites, ready to be used to turn the age!
Lord, make me someone who would meet Your need... a young person absolute for Your move!
I really like this song because I can put the words into it. I love You God. (: This is just a really good song and that's that! (:

In this godless age, I want to be a Samuel burdened with a vision clear of Your economy. In my studies, in my living, cause me to care for You, even to put myself aside. Cause me to meet Your need. I want my heart to be a photo of Your heart. But not only me. Make us, the young people, Your Nazarites! Absolute for Your move.

O Lord! Make us those who meet YOUR NEED in this Godless age! the Nazarites through whom you'd end this age! So Lord, we consecrate ourselves absolutely to you, to be trained by you, and to be absolutely one with you and one with what you are doing! Save us from being just a good servant! Lord, we'd like to bring you back! Do whatever you need in us to make us your dispensational instrument! Meet your need through us!
Raise up people who are really burdened and absolute for Your move! Lord, we voluntarily give ourselves to You for Your satisfaction!
Lord, MAKE US those who meet Your need! MAKE US those through whom You'd close this age. Who are one with You to bring the kingdom in, young people ABSOLUTE for Your move.
Lord, train us up today! Those who "e'en the very index of Your eyes... would obey!" May You have a living testimony on the earth for Your economy, Your delight and pleasure.
Amen! Lord, may we be those who pray, who lay the tracks for You! Make us those through whom You'd close this age!
